entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is trying to solve a riddle.

entities.name: sphinx
entities.description: A creature with the body of a lion and the head of an eagle that poses riddles to those who dare to answer them.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with the sphinx by trying to solve its riddle and asking for clues.
Harry is communicating with the sphinx by repeating lines from a poem and asking for clarification on certain words.
